Text: Re CalPeak Power RFP Shortlist Cc Power LLC is a project company and is now a wholly owned subisdiary of Untited Technologies Corporation NYSE UTC UTC information is available at wwwutccom and from the commercial rating services It is not invisioned that CalPeak will benifit from an absolute gurantee from UTC however some credit suport mechanism will be built into the project and into the fuel supply agreements Chuck Original Message From To Cc Sent Monday April PM Subject Re CalPeak Power RFP Shortlist Ann I just spoke with Jay Williams from our credit department and he only needs CalPeaks latest audited financial statements with management notes Any additional information that helps us understand the company and how it is set up will be helpful Sending this information overnight will probobly be our best bet My address is as follows Smith Street EBa Houston TX Also Jays phone number is Let me know if you have any questions Thanks Kim

Re CalPeak Power RFP Shortlist Cc formed as a project company and is being funded by UTC CalPeak was formed less than two months ago and has no financials We will provide a pro forma balance sheet should the bidder be selected Types of typical project support are things like a UT gurantee for one months fuel supply etc Chuck Original Message From Ann Donnelly To Charles Hinckley Cc Lyons Mark Sent Monday April PM Subject RE CalPeak Power RFP Shortlist I just spoke with Kim and she updated me that her credit manager is very satisfied with the creditworthiness of United Technologies he thoroughly reviewed the website and all available information He reports UT has an A rating However he can find no link to CalPeak Power and could we please provide that Kim would also like some additional specifics on the mechanisms that are envisioned for credit support from UT to CalPeak Ann T Donnelly PhD Principal Consultant Power Resource Managers LLP C Street Suite Vancouver WA Phone Fax email Website httpwwwprmllpcom Original Message From Charles Hinckley mailto Sent Monday April PM To Cc Lyons Mark Subject Re CalPeak Power RFP Shortlist CalPeak Power LLC is a project company and
